name: I Was the Cat
description:
You ever have a bad day? 
Well... Today you have. 

Work sucks. Your partner sucks. 
And you think... maybe... life isn't worth it.

Until an angel bumps into you.

And, just like that, you have a whole new purpose in life.

Follow our unlikely heroine, as she navigates her newfound zeal for life and pursues the woman of her dreams.

Made for YandereJam 2023

Features: 6.5k word story (About 1.5 Hours Playtime) 

Credits:

  • Director, programmer, writer: TundraFlame (@tundraflame)
  • Character, BG, & CG Artist, Editor: T. Chase (@chasecubed)
  • Sound Design & Music : Angela Geiss (@holyeggshells)
  • Voice Actor (Pickpocket, HR): Jesse Lam
  • Voice Actor (John, Additional Voices): Christine Vo
  • Voice Actor (Main Character): AkuMeowie (Twitter/ Twitch) 
  • Voice Actor (Love Interest): Diana Vides (@knightadora)

CONTENT WARNINGS: Descriptions of Violence, Suicidal Ideations and Stalking
